name: EGG PLANT
description: Egg plant are mildly sweet, moist and never bitter. Because of their small size, the silky flesh will cook quickly.

name: BROCOLLI
description: Brocolli are naturally low in calories, carbohydrates, sodium, fat and cholesterol & hydrating properties.

name: CAPSICUM
description: A fresh, crisp green capsicum is a tasty vegetable that can be a regular part of your healthy eating plan.

name: CARROT
description: Carrots are an excellent source of vitamin a and they help promote heart, eye, brain, skin and liver health.

name: TOMATO
description: The tomato is consumed in diverse ways, including raw, as an ingredient in many dishes, sauces, salads, and drinks.

name: KACHKOLA
description: Nutritionally, the green banana is a good source of fiber, vitamins and minerals, and contains a starch that controls blood sugar.

name: CAULIFLOWER
description: Cauliflower is high in vitamin B-6, with a 1-cup boiled serving containing 39 percent of your daily value.

name: POTATO
description: Buy regular potato from us which provides you with dietary fiber, potassium, vitamins, etc.

name: PINEAPPLE
description: Fresh pineapples contain 50 calories per 100 grams, which amounts to only 83 calories per cup (165 grams).

name: RED CHILLI
description: The heat of chilies is stored mostly in the seeds and membranes, so remove these to remove the heat.

name: PARSLEY
description: Locally sourced. With its sweet, bright aroma, fresh parsley is used a lot in cooking and good for body fitness.
